title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: When running the control example and resizing the window only in the vertical direction, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, resulting in reduced flashing.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
